name: Medieval Chef
description:
(This game was made during the BUG Spring Jam 2017.)

Team:

  • Muhteşem Reyyan Jazzar - Narrative/Design
  • Ömer Said Çağdır - 2D Art/Design/Programming

In this short visual-novel/drag&drop game, you take the role of a royal cook who prepares a feast for the royal family members: The King, the queen, the prince and the princess. You can put a selection of potions and ingridients to their meals and shape the future of the kingdom.

The game has dozens of ending combinations based on your choices.

Made with Unity.
